divs: Sighting DetailsDriving South on Cole street. Noticed movement through top window of Jeep. Clear night, relatively no clouds at approx 8:15 pm. 4 translucent lights moved in a circle as if chasing each other about 2x then all 4 met in the middle one by one then dispersed back into circular chasing. Husband and I watched until we drove out of sight. Approx 6-8 months ago witnessed similar sighting facing towards Delphos area. That sighting was one light traveling in a circle for 2 hours. The lights in both were translucent and could see the clouds behind them and look projected from above the clouds but was not an advertising light. I am curious and kind of scared due to there being no explanation for either sighting.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lima
There were no other sightings in Lima on or around October 12th 2013
Summary: 4 translucent lights spun counter clockwise then one by one would meet in the middle then spread back out. The lights didn't appear to be on an object. This was my second sighting in different location in Lima within 6 months.
